description: A `WidgetCollection` is an array-like object representing a set of widgets, as returned by the widget methods `children` and `find`.

parameters.name: widgets
parameters.description: Array of widgets to include in the WidgetCollection

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: In the listener function, `this` will point to this object.

on.description: Adds the given listener to all widgets in this collection. See also `Widget.on()`.

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: In the listener function, `this` will point to this object.

once.description: Adds the given listener for single execution on all widgets in this collection. See also `Widget.once()`.

off.description: Removes the given listener from all widgets in this collection. See also `Widget.off()`.

trigger.description: Triggers an event of the given type on all widgets in this collection. See also `Widget.trigger()`

get.description: Returns the value of the given property of the first widget in this collection.

set.description: Sets the given property on all widgets in this collection. See also `Widget.set()`.
Sets all key-value pairs in the properties object on all widgets in this collection. See also `Widget.set()`.

parameters.name: selector
parameters.description: A selector expression or a predicate function to filter the results.

children.description: Returns a collection containing all children of all widgets in this collection that match the given selector.

parameters.name: constructor
parameters.description: A class to filter the results.

children.description: Returns a collection containing all children of all widgets in this collection that are instances of the given class.

parameters.name: selector
parameters.description: A selector expression or a predicate function to filter the results.

find.description: Returns a collection containing all descendants of all widgets in this collection that match the given selector.

parameters.name: constructor
parameters.description: A class to filter the results.

find.description: Returns a collection containing all descendants of all widgets in this collection that are instances of the given class.

parent.description: Returns a collection containing all direct parents of the widgets in this collection.

parameters.name: parent
parameters.description: The parent widget to append to.

appendTo.description: Appends all widgets in this collection to the given parent widget.

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: The properties and target values to animate.

animate.description: Animates all widgets in this collection.

dispose.description: Disposes all widgets in this collection.

parameters.name: selector
parameters.description: A selector expression or a predicate function to filter the results.

first.description: Returns the first widget in the collection that is matched by the selector. Without selector, it is the same as `collection[0]`.

parameters.name: constructor
parameters.description: A class to filter the results.

first.description: Returns the first widget in the collection that is an instance of the given class.

parameters.name: selector
parameters.description: A selector expression or a predicate function to filter the results.

last.description: Returns the last widget in the collection that is matched by the selector. Without selector, it is the same as `collection[collection.length - 1]`.

parameters.name: constructor
parameters.description: A class to filter the results.

last.description: Returns the last widget in the collection that is an instance of the given class.

toArray.description: Returns an Array containing all widgets in the collection.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.type: (widget: Widget, index: number, collection: WidgetCollection) => void
parameters.ts_type: (widget: T, index: number, collection: WidgetCollection<T>) => void
parameters.description: The function to call for each widget. The arguments are: *widget*, *index*, *collection*

forEach.description: Calls the given callback function once for each widget in the collection.

parameters.name: selector
parameters.description: A selector expression or a predicate function to filter the results.

filter.description: Returns a new *WidgetCollection* containing all widgets in this collection that match the given selector.

parameters.name: constructor
parameters.description: A class to filter the results.

filter.description: Returns a new *WidgetCollection* containing all widgets in this collection that are instances of the given class.

parameters.name: widget
parameters.description: The widget to locate in the collection.

indexOf.description: Returns the index of the given widget within the collection, or `-1` if the widget is not present.

parameters.name: widget
parameters.description: The widget to search in the collection.

includes.description: Returns `true` if the given widget is included in the collection, `false` otherwise.

length.description: Contains the number of widgets in the collection.
